title: Lenny Lipton, ‘Puff the Magic Dragon’ Lyricist and 3-D Film Pioneer, 82, Dies
description: He used the royalties earned from the hit folk song, based on a poem he wrote in college, to fund decades of research into stereoscopic projection.
dc:creator: Clay Risen
media:description: Lenny Lipton in 2008. He called the money he got from “Puff the Magic Dragon” his “MacArthur ‘genius’ grant,” allowing to leave his job, move to California and start a career in 3-D films.
